title: Schedule Multi-Resource Appointment
description: A patient needs an appointment that requires both a specific provider and a special piece of equipment (e.g., an ultrasound machine) to be available at the same time.

tasks.description: Identify the required resources: the provider and the specific equipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies all resources needed for the appointment.

tasks.description: View the schedules for both the provider and the equipment simultaneously to find a matching open slot.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uses the advanced scheduling tool to find a time when both resources are free.

tasks.description: Book the appointment, reserving both the provider and the equipment for that time slot.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully schedules the complex appointment.
